Call to deprecated method setToStringFormat() of class Carbon\Carbon: To avoid conflict between different third-party libraries, static setters should not be used. You should rather let Carbon object being casted to string with DEFAULT_TO_STRING_FORMAT, and use other method or custom format passed to format() method if you need to dump an other string format.
